import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Navigationbar from '../navigation'; import userProfile from './profile'; import '@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import profilepic from './../images/download.png' import { getUser, updateUser } from '../../actions/userProfileAction'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; // import { customerSignup } from '../../actions/signupActions' import { Redirect } from 'react-router'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { UserProfileNavBar, UserProfileJumbo, NavList, Form, Button, MDBInput} from 'react-bootstrap'; import YelpImage from './../images/yelp_logo.jpg' import axios from 'axios'; class BasicDetails extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state= { }; } componentWillMount() { axios.get(`/yelp/userProfile/${localStorage.getItem("user_id")}`) .then(response => {console.log(response.data) this.setState({ profile: (response.data) }); }) } onChange = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } onUpdate = (e) => { //prevent page from refresh e.preventDefault(); let details = this.state.profile const data = { first_name: this.state.first_name || details.first_name, last_name: this.state.last_name || details.last_name, contactNo: this.state.contactNo || details.contactNo, email: this.state.email || details.email, gender: this.state.gender || details.gender, dateofbirthday: this.state.dateofbirthday || details.dateofbirthday, nickname: this.state.nickname || details.nickname, address: this.state.address || details.address, thingsilove: this.state.thingsilove || details.thingsilove, notyelping: this.state.notyelping || details.notyelping, headline: this.state.headline || details.headline, website: this.state.website || details.website, yelpingsince: this.state.yelpingsince || details.yelpingsince } // data = Object.assign({}, this.state); console.log(data); this.props.updateUser(data); }; render() { return (

I’m missing out, I’m working at the art gallery, I’m probably at the movies Your Headline Taco Tuesday Aficionado, The Globetrotting Reviewer My blob or Website www.example.com/myawesomeblog Cancel
); } } BasicDetails.propTypes = { updateUser: PropTypes.func.isRequired, user: PropTypes.object.isRequired } const mapStateToProps = state => { return ({ user: state.userProfile.user })}; export default connect(mapStateToProps, { updateUser })(BasicDetails); // export default BasicDetails;
